description: Standardized action definitions for integrity violation responses across core AGI modules (PSIM, RACM).

REJECT_HARDSUSPEND_A.description: Immediate halt of processing thread (Thread-Local Suspend). Diagnostic flag Primary Channel (Low-Latency). No retry.

REJECT_HARDSUSPEND_B.description: Immediate halt of dependent execution cluster. Diagnostic flag Primary and Secondary channels (Secure Log Write). Initiate traceback.

ISOLATE_SHUTDOWN.description: Force termination of the originating manager process and segment isolation (Sandbox purge). Notify Core Sentinel.

ADVISORY.description: Log anomaly in tertiary channel. Allow continued processing based on current trust heuristic.
